subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Monta Ellis scored 12 of his 29 points to lead a fourth-quarter comeback as Dallas edged San Antonio. Portland held off Houston in Game 6 to advance to the Western Conference semifinals for the first time in 14 years.
snippet: Monta Ellis scored 12 of his 29 points to lead a fourth-quarter comeback as Dallas edged San Antonio. Portland held off Houston in Game 6 to advance to the Western Conference semifinals for the first time in 14 years.
